content: basic beanie ©2019 molly conroyungerecht all rights reserved 1 e sizes small 19 medium 20 21 large 22 23 g a p materials one skein urth uneek worsted 100% superwash wool 200m/220yds 100g/3 5oz color 4006 4009 or monokrom worsted 4057 16 size us 6/4 0 mm circular knitting needles 16 size us 7/4 5 mm circular knitting needles set of 4 double pointed needle size us 7/4 5mm 10 ring stitch markers one must be contrasting to mark beginning of rounds yarn needle or large embroidery needle gauge 5 sts and 7 row to 1 on stockinette stitch circular gauge using larger knitting needles abbreviations/terms/techniques beg = begin ning s btwn = between dpn = double pointed needle g = gram s k = knit k2tog = knit two stitches together as if they were one results in a one stitch decrease m = meter s oz = ounce s p = purl patt s = pattern ed ing s pcm = place contrasting market pm = place stitch marker on needle rem = remain ed ing s repeat s = repeat ed ing s round s = round s sm = slip marker st s = stitch es yd s = yard s 2 e g a p directions directions are the same for all three sizes other than the cast on total number of rounds knitted and the first row of the crown decreases directions are written for small with medium and large directions in parentheses beg at brim with smaller circular needle co 96 102 108 sts pcm to indicate beg of rnds join to work in rnds being careful not to twist your cast on rnds 1 - 8 k2 p1 repeat to end rnds 9 21 k5 p1 repeat to end change to larger needles round 22 44 49 53 k crown decreases change to dpns when needed round 1 small k7 k2tog k14 k2tog 5x k7 90 sts medium k25 k2tog k49 k2tog k24 100 sts large k12 k2tog k11 k2tog repeat to end 100 sts round 2 k10 pm repeat to end round 3 k to 2 sts from marker k2tog sm repeat to end round 4 k repeat rnds 3 4 until 3 sts rem btwn markers repeat round 3 until 1 st rem btwn markers finishing cut yarn end to 6 thread yarn end through yarn needle weave through sts to secure in the same order as knitted weave in all loose yarn ends cut off excess yarn no material in this pattern partial or whole may be reproduced transmitted or shared or sold by any means without express written permission of designer no items made from this pattern may be sold without express written permission of designer every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is accurate and complete however i cannot be responsible for differences of individual knitters human or typographical errors please direct any questions or comments to handsonknittingcenter@gmail com 3 e ©2019 molly conroyungerecht
